original_text: Seven days thou shalt eat unleavened bread, and in the seventh day shall be a feast to the Lord.
korean_text: 이레 동안 무교병을 먹고 일곱째 날에는 여호와께 절기를 지키라

sentences.original_text: Seven days thou shalt eat unleavened bread
sentences.korean_translation: 이레 동안 너는 누룩 없는 떡을 먹을지니

sentences.original_text: shall be a feast to the Lord
